label: cascading_failure_01_dx_storage_capacity_029
content:
## 2026-01-30 Daily Operations Summary

  - Raw TB Used: 9108
  - Raw TB Free: 712

  - Effective TB Used: 6470
  - Effective TB Free: 70

  - Coldest Node Utilization Percentage: 57.9

  - Rebalance Jobs Completed: 14

  - Average Object KB: 86

### Infrastructure
- stor-a-07
  - CPU Percentage: 98
  - Memory Percentage: 92
  - Disk Used Percentage: 99
  - Disk Busy Percentage: 99
  - Net In Gbps: 12.1
  - Net Out Gbps: 10.6
  - IO Wait Percentage: 19.7

- stor-b-18
  - CPU Percentage: 82
  - Memory Percentage: 84
  - Disk Used Percentage: 99
  - Disk Busy Percentage: 98
  - Net In Gbps: 9.2
  - Net Out Gbps: 8.4
  - IO Wait Percentage: 13.8

- stor-c-26
  - CPU Percentage: 73
  - Memory Percentage: 78
  - Disk Used Percentage: 97
  - Disk Busy Percentage: 93
  - Net In Gbps: 7.5
  - Net Out Gbps: 6.9
  - IO Wait Percentage: 9.8

- meta-01
  - CPU Percentage: 88
  - Memory Percentage: 97
  - Disk Used Percentage: 92
  - Disk Busy Percentage: 87
  - Net In Gbps: 5.3
  - Net Out Gbps: 4.5
  - IO Wait Percentage: 8.8

### Events
- Utilization reached 92.8% effective free only 70 TB; invoked incident-level capacity controls: halt all non-critical writes and require approvals for any bulk ingest.
- Quota hard blocks escalated to 9; established war-room with tenant owners to coordinate immediate deletions and archival migrations.
- Compaction pending surged to 164 with scrub errors 58; initiated continuous compaction mode and postponed all discretionary maintenance.
- Restore drill performed for audit readiness; RTO 51 minutes, noted that restore speed is impacted by high disk busy—documented mitigation to reserve bandwidth during drills.

### On Call
- Shift: Calvin U.
- Pages: 16
- Tickets: 27
- Status: Degraded/Critical
- Notes: Near-capacity operation with strict write controls, continuous compaction, and active tenant coordination for emergency space recovery.
